message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to offer $1400000 for it. Can you consider my counteroffer?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1800000. How about we meet in the middle at $1700000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $1600000 for the product. Can you consider my revised counteroffer?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1650000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a price that's reasonable for this incredible product. How about we meet at $1625000?
I understand you're making one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1550000. I'm willing to offer $1550000 for the product. Can you consider my revised counteroffer?
